node.snippet: In this article, I will outline through some of the most popular breakthroughs in AI - with hope to inspire people on diving in deeper and experiment more - maybe even revisit old techniques and apply on top of newer architectures.

frontmatter.title: A history of progress on text representation in NLP (Part 1 - Word-level representation)

node.snippet: Stay tuned for more updates, and have a nice day!
